description: This file defines and configures an AI agent for image generation using the Replicate API, including setting up the agent with specific tools and instructions, and making a test call to generate an image.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific tools, model, and instructions.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used within the agent.

classes.name: ReplicateTools
classes.description: Tools for interacting with the Replicate API for media generation.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method called on the agent to generate and output a response based on a prompt.

search-terms: create an agent for image generation
